snippet.title: The Simpsons Road Rage-Commercial
snippet.description:
I found this commercial on an artists website who worked on this game, Hit and Run and very interestingly Hit and Run 2(!) (If only I could remember where from.)

I liked this game despite its slippery controls and short story mode.

I tried to upload the PlayStation 2 trailer, but I'm unable to for some reason.
